user_query: I'm planning a cryptocurrency investment strategy and need market insights.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest market details for the coin with UUID Qwsogvtv82FCd using the coin markets API.
Provide OHLC data for the coin over the last 30 days using the coin OHLC data API.
Flip a coin to decide whether to invest or not using the Heads / Tails API.
